title: Part 1: Heat Wave + Dead or Alive (ACS September 2)
itunes:title: Part 1: Heat Wave + Dead or Alive (ACS September 2)
description:
The gang is feeling the heat with dangerously high temperatures in Southern California and Dawson tells a story of how he was cut off from the AC in an Uber. Adam gets into Uber dividers, flavor enhancers, and Rob Reiner’s inability to answer a simple question. After a year break, they resurrect the game ‘Dead or Alive’ to guess the living status of some beloved celebrities. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

Geico.com

The Jordan Harbinger Show
